fields.question: What is APIT?
fields.answer: APIT (Advance Personal Income Tax) is the monthly tax deducted by employers from employment income. It's a pay-as-you-earn system that helps spread your tax liability throughout the year rather than paying a lump sum.

fields.question: What is Personal Relief?
fields.answer: Personal Relief is a standard annual tax deduction of Rs. 1,200,000 available to all individual taxpayers. This amount is deducted from your total taxable income before calculating your tax liability.
